articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: European markets mixed, Erste Group Bank rises 7% after acquiring stake in Santander's Polish unit - CNBC
articles.description: European bourses saw a mixed start to the week on Monday, with U.K. markets closed for a bank holiday.
articles.content: European bourses had a mixed start to the week on Monday, with U.K. markets closed for a bank holiday, as investors looked ahead to the latest economic data and corporate earnings reports due this we… [+2200 chars]
